resources.string:
Next feature release
 New Features:
 · Parallel loading from different platforms to speed up live map
 · All GCVote related settings moved to Menu-Services-GCVote
 · Support of some GSAK specific GPX contents
 · Create waypoint from personal note also for OC caches
 Bugfixing:
 · Corrected wrong field note progress indication
 · When using "external map" sometimes the position marker was not shown\m · Circles on map now also shown for caches with final coords defined
 · Adding event caches to calendar corrected for events without starting time
 · Logging of OC caches was not possible if no GC login data was stored
